text: John Garner may refer to: *John Nance Garner (1868–1967), Vice President of the United States (1933-1941) *John Garner (golfer) (born 1947), English golfer *John Donald Garner (born 1931), British diplomat *John T. Garner (1809–1888), soldier in the Texas Army during the Texas Revolution
title: John Garner
